verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] been criticized for his outreach to Russia , particularly after the Obama administration severed US - Russian ties following the annexation of Crimea .
President Donald Trump has [V: been] criticized for his outreach to Russia , particularly after the Obama administration severed US - Russian ties following the annexation of Crimea .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump] has been [V: criticized] [ARG2: for his outreach to Russia] , [ARGM-TMP: particularly after the Obama administration severed US - Russian ties following the annexation of Crimea] .

President Donald Trump has been criticized for his outreach to Russia , particularly after [ARG0: the Obama administration] [V: severed] [ARG1: US - Russian ties] [ARGM-TMP: following the annexation of Crimea] .
President Donald Trump has been criticized for his outreach to Russia , particularly after the Obama administration severed US - Russian ties [V: following] [ARG2: the annexation of Crimea] .
